CN.content:
Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: For the photovoltaic devices fabricated using PFD2TBT - based polymers , the shortcircuit currents of the devices also increased as the perylene content in the copolymers increased ; however , the PCEs of the devices using PFD2TBT - based polymers were lower than those of PFDTBT - based polymers because of lower open - circuit voltages and short - circuit currents.

Let's think step by step.

| Material Name |
| --- |
| PFD2TBT - based polymers |
| PFDTBT - based polymers |
| perylene |
| copolymers |

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Material name" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Material Name |
| --- |
| PFD2TBT - based polymers |
| PFDTBT - based polymers |

These are the only entities in the paragraph that can be clearly identified as materials. "perylene" is a component of the "PFD2TBT - based polymers" and "PFDTBT - based polymers", so it is not listed separately. "devices" and "short-circuit voltages" are not material names.

PN.content:
Please identify the "Property Name" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Name". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: For the photovoltaic devices fabricated using PFD2TBT - based polymers , the shortcircuit currents of the devices also increased as the perylene content in the copolymers increased ; however , the PCEs of the devices using PFD2TBT - based polymers were lower than those of PFDTBT - based polymers because of lower open - circuit voltages and short - circuit currents.

Let's think step by step.

| Property Name |
| --- |
| shortcircuit currents of the photovoltaic devices |
| perylene content in the copolymers |
| open-circuit voltages |
| PCEs (Power Conversion Efficiencies) of the devices |
| PFD2TBT - based polymers |
| PFDTBT - based polymers

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Material property" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Property Name |
| --- |
| short circuit currents of photovoltaic devices using PFD2TBT - based polymers |
| perylene content in copolymers |
| open-circuit voltages |
| Power Conversion Efficiencies (PCEs) of devices using PFD2TBT - based polymers |
| Power Conversion Efficiencies of devices using PFDTBT - based polymers |

Paragraph: For the photovoltaic devices fabricated using PFD2TBT - based polymers , the shortcircuit currents of the devices also increased as the perylene content in the copolymers increased ; however , the PCEs of the devices using PFD2TBT - based polymers were lower than those of PFDTBT - based polymers because of lower open - circuit voltages and short - circuit currents.

Let's think step by step.

| Property Value |
| --- |
| shortcircuit currents of the devices using PFD2TBT - based polymers |
| perylene content in the copolymers |
| PCEs of the devices using PFD2TBT - based polymers |
| open - circuit voltages of the devices using PFD2TBT - based polymers |
| short - circuit currents of the devices using PFDTBT - based polymers |

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Value of material property" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Value".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Property Value |
| --- |

Note: In this case, "PCEs" (Power Conversion Efficiencies) were removed as they are not directly material properties, but rather a measure of the device performance.
